website_summaries.verdict: Nice looking claw-foot tub faucet with labeled X-style handles and a handheld shower.
pros: Construction of the parts in this vintage-looking faucet should give you a good performance for a long time
Good flow rate for both the faucet and the showerhead
Available in 4 different finishes of oil-rubbed bronze, brass, chrome, and nickel
cons: May be difficult to fit certain sizes of claw-foot tubs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product but beware if a piece comes defective!
customer_reviews.text: This product was excellent without any problems. On another product ordered 3 years ago, Kingston Brass would not honor a 10-year warranty for a very small piece that was warped. The warranty clearly states " free from defects in material and workmanship for a period of 10 years." I was not able to have it installed for 3 years from purchase. It sat safely in the box. The arrogant person on the phone told me about a 90-day open box policy. This was not stated in the warranty. It is very difficult to get a person on the phone to get help. Bottom line, beautiful product but customer service is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Rak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in my clawfoot tub
customer_reviews.text: I had this installed today. I am delighted by the quality and performance. It goes so well with my clawfoot tub. My one small disappointment is it protrudes into the bathing space more than I expected, but this might be the adjustable hole spacing. My plumber didn't have any trouble with the install. I was so happy to find a tub mounted retro faucet.
customer_reviews.author: marcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this design. it looks fantastic on our claw foot tub. Everything works flawlessly. The kids love it so much that they even want to take baths. That's an amazing thing in itself. My one drawback that I found was that the instructions that were included were not very thorough and it took some time to think about how it should be attached exactly (which washers go inside and which go outside. For that I would have given it 4 stars, but it just looks so nice and works so great I couldn't downgrade it because of that
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY from Kingston Brass
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product-TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE Installed it to find out it had a manufacturer defect -leaky valve and the customer service expects me to pay to have a part expedited or have my plumber uninstall the unit and send the whole thing back and then they would send a new one. Who's paying the plumber?
customer_reviews.author: Shakti Khalsa

customer_reviews.title: ) Actually looks and feels like it came with the tub
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Solid, quality faucet. We put it on the tub wall of our very old clawfoot tub. It does stick into the tub a bit more than I was expecting, but I have not found this to be a problem. The quality and total lack of plastic was both refreshing and appreciated :) Actually looks and feels like it came with the tub. I called the company to ask questions and they were incredibly helpful, even offering to walk me through the installation process. Did not end up needing help though, because the directions that came with the product were good and clear.
customer_reviews.author: SuperKaiaFragilisticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. High flow so it fills the tub quickly. Also the flexible shower hose is perfect weight and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Mann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived this morning and I had it installed within 2 hours. Outstanding product. It was very easy to assemble and no leaks!!! The product does work on a bear claw bathtub with inside holes. They included an adapter kit to make it easy. It looks great and the shower has lots of pressure behind it. If you want to save some money and have a desire to do it yourself than this product is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: montcowboy

customer_reviews.title: Hire a good plumber!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, but took a very long time to get the hand shower to work. If you leave the restrictor device in it, there is hardly any flow in the hand shower. If you take it out, it sprays so hard that it flips out of the holder. Yes, there is a way to get it in between and it took the plumber a while to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Very easy to install. Looks fantastic. One word of advice - if you have old supply lines and have a hard time getting this faucet to connect, save yourself some headaches and buy new flexible supply lines from your nearest hardware store. It will save you loads of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet was easy to install and it looks great. It took about an hour to install and I didn't need any special items other than wrenches and some teflon tape. I recommend using a rag to protect the finish from the wrenches. If it leaks then you have put it together incorrectly. I had to play around with the order of the washers because the directions were pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edmunds

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the faucet, it was installed on the tub with ease. Make sure that the fittings are installed through the tub wall the correct way. Haven't had any issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Finish is great. Full flow with about a 1/2 a turn of the knob. No complains.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Watts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fixture to replace the 1925 faucet that was on the tub since that time. Now I have the hand-held unit and have also plugged a shower riser into the top of it. Beautiful and works perfectly. I'm so pleased to have gotten it at a discount because similar units I might have purchased were about $100 more.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kyro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. This worked amazing and was made really well. Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item at a great price. Installation wasn't too hard and I would highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RGK

customer_reviews.title: Love the looks, but not the most comfortable bath/shower
customer_reviews.text: i have a 4" apart faucet set, and it hangs little lower... Shower handle is good, depending on your water pressure, the handle will get out of control, unlike the wall mounted showers, If the water is hot, the shower hose and handle will get super hot so make sure you just touch the white handle part, not the head or hose. Overall I love the looks but not the most comfortable bath/shower faucet, handle.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey leigh

customer_reviews.title: High-end look and quality, excellent price!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, looks great, sturdy material. This faucet is listed several times....in may different colors and prices. We chose the cheapest..it is chrome. I wouldn't change a thing. My husband installed it in our tailor house with no problems. High-end look and quality, excellent price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna faye

customer_reviews.title: This product is very well made and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well made and easy to install. I bought the connector kit and didn't end up needing it. It fits my vintage tub with 3 1/2" tub wall mounts perfectly! Made my vintage bathroom exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delighted!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. Prompt delivery service and the faucet is heavy gage brass. It is very attractive, easy to install and so far it works like a charm - no drips and easy to use handles. The shower is very high pressure and will need some curtains or deflection of some sort. 3 1/2 inch centered holes is a tight fit but it does fit:)
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Voss

customer_reviews.title: Great faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love this faucet! We recently remodeled our bathroom and replaced an antique replica faucet with this one. It looks great on our 100+ year old tub and works great! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Best as a wall mount-faucet is really low.
customer_reviews.text: Faucet was really nice but did not work for a tub mount. No issues with it fitting in the tub holes. When it was mounted the actual faucet was below the overdrawn. It would be a great faucet if you are looking for a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: GrnMtnGirl

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put together, no instructions, rides lower ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together, no instructions, rides lower in tub than expected. But solidly built and has lots of pressure at shower head
customer_reviews.author: Mountain lady

customer_reviews.title: We bought the wrong faucet
customer_reviews.text: We needed the deck mount not wall mount. They are both beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with my new Claw Foot Tub and have it mounted to come out of the wall and am very happy with it. I is well made and has that old style I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Stone

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this two months ago for clawfoot tub in our 1910 home. Similar item was almost twice the cost at a local retailer. Plumber who installed it commented that it was a good quality fixture. Very happy with it thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Sharilyn Rediess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated it 5 stars but have no idea of ultimate durability. As a general contractor though I was pleasantly surprised by the fit and finish. It was easy to install and ALL the parts for installation were included. My friend for whom this was purchased is equally impressed. It was installed for a vintage claw foot tub in an Oakland live work space.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this. It's made of solid material and looks great mounted. The spray nozzle is awesome for washing my dog. I would recommend. I am using this in my garage utility sink.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Quality Faucet
customer_reviews.text: We looked long and hard for a faucet for our tub, but most of the so called good ones were astronomical in price. Any that were cheaper were cheap to say the least until we ran across this one. Heavy duty construction, brilliant shine and ease of installation are a plus with the Kingston faucet. Fits multiple size openings, ours was 3 inches and no problems encountered. If you are not mechanically inclined you might have to have a pro to install but for me it was easy as anything I have hooked up. My wife is Happy, Happy, Happy.
customer_reviews.author: MACANIC

customer_reviews.title: Bought two
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second one once I received the first, one in the bath & the other in the laundry. Very heavy and beautiful. Love the spray attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hudspeth

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL! APPLAUSE Makes my bathroom beautiul
customer_reviews.text: This is half the price than model at home improvement center. BEAUTIFUL! APPLAUSE Makes my bathroom beautiul. I hope it lasts! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: april pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks so perfect in my vintage bathtub and even my contractor commented on the quality of the product. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Louka

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I use this faucet as a wall mount for my clawfoot tub. It looks so classic and beautiful. I am totally in love with this faucet.
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Solid and nice looking product, but couldn't find required elbows
customer_reviews.text: We were unable to mount this to the tub wall. The installation leaflet showed two set of elbowsincluding one male and one female. We contacted Kingston Brass as well as several local specialty plumbing stores to try get fittings or adapters to connect it to our existing water supply lines, but had no success and gave up and returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: m f

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with fast shipping. Installation was fairly simple and adjustable to fit our tub. Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: DLC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looked good until the 'hot' label ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looked good until the 'hot' label popped off after only about 2 months. Looks like it was held on with some cheap adhesive that obviously did not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Junkyard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for the price. Would not purchase again, as it has already started leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Hoevker

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I just put together an entire new bath and although I went more modern with my freestanding tub this piece went great with it. The brushed nickel matched perfectly with my Danze shower body. Delivery was quick and painless.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiemay

customer_reviews.title: Brass dulls if you use cleaners. Only use soap ...
customer_reviews.text: Brass dulls if you use cleaners. Only use soap and water!
customer_reviews.author: D. Guy

customer_reviews.title: Also it cost a pretty penny for the plumber to install when what looked ...
customer_reviews.text: Comes exactly as seen on line BUT the hot and cold labels fell off within 2 weeks. Also it cost a pretty penny for the plumber to install when what looked simple turned out not to be so simple.
customer_reviews.author: AL in Mass

customer_reviews.title: Good faucet
customer_reviews.text: i was a little leary ordering a lower-priced wall mounted tub faucet online, and possibly not being happy and having to deal with returning it. But the new faucet is great, better than the old one that wore out, and I'm happy with my purchase. It looks attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ilves

customer_reviews.title: Not made well.
customer_reviews.text: Shower head broke off and I had to order a mismatched one from the distributor. White circle in the middle of the handle fell off soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save me thousands
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Easy install. Would buy again. Better quality than expected and much cheaper than Lowes. This faucet allowed me to turn an old tub into a tub and shower. Just had to hang shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Bihili

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: I left off a star only because the spout hangs down lower than the overflow drain, but it still looks great! The sprayer works great and the sprayer cord is nice and long. It works and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Johnson

customer_reviews.title: looks good...
customer_reviews.text: so the product did not come with the right size washers, so we had to go buy different ones. It also just barely fit our tub and looks a little wonky. The size says it should fit, but I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D.

customer_reviews.title: handle broke
customer_reviews.text: I dropped the handle in the tub the second time I used it AMD the porcelain on it broke. Be very careful! Otherwise, it looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: rmw

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Not too expensive but looks very expensive and works great.
customer_reviews.author: KSC

customer_reviews.title: faucet was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: faucet was easy to install , very happy with quality and rec'd item within 48 hrs after ordering, great all around experience..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The nuts to bolt this on would not work as-is ...
customer_reviews.text: The nuts to bolt this on would not work as-is. Had to cut offf half the brass treaded part in the back for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Trierweiler

customer_reviews.title: Very well made faucet
customer_reviews.text: Well made,easy to install.I needed a through the wall faucet for my tub and this one exceeded my expectations.Chrome plated brass,not cheaply made. Very nice!!
customer_reviews.author: tfle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This faucet was perfect fit on our clawfoot tub and very well made. We looked at more expinsive units but this one was cheeper and looks expensive.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: outstanding hardware/faucet
customer_reviews.text: we mounted this on the inside of an old cast iron tub. it is a top-notch upgrade. knobs are smooth. gaskets don't leak. hardware is heavy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: wwad

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: This faucet is perfect for my clawfoot tub. Easy installation and works great! Thumbs up! No problems after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri L Wahdan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, but wrong product for my application
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be perfect for our clawfoot tub. I did not realize that it would not work for us since it could not connect to the water line properly. My bad, bought the wrong faucet. Luckily I could return it since we did not open it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's big, but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully finished product with great range. The shower is uber powerful with a very loose, easy to maneuver cord. The handles all have a solid feel to them. Only drawback is the faucet's profile, which is substantial. It sticks out very far into the bathtub, but at least it looks great doing so.
customer_reviews.author: N. Strauch

customer_reviews.title: We liked it.
customer_reviews.text: It was everything we hoped for at a price that was much less then other places listed.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Pohorence

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but doesn't come with mounting for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but doesn't come with mounting for the shower head on the wall if you need it. Pretty faucet though!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Kingston Brass KS265C Clawfoot Tub Wall Mount Faucet, Polished Chrome
customer_reviews.text: Product was just as depicted and looks wonderful with my refinished clawfoot tub. The guy I hired to do some refurbishing to my old home had no trouble installing it in the old tub. We also bought a surround shower rod for claw foot tubs, and a hand held shower mount which he attached to the shower rod, so there is an option to place the hand held shower up on the rod for a standup shower.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and exactly what we needed to fit it on an antique bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sorn

customer_reviews.title: Much adjusting to make it work!
customer_reviews.text: We gave it four stars only because after much adjusting it looks great and functions well! It just took a while to make it work on my antique claw-foot tub.
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. O'keeffe

customer_reviews.title: Clawfoot Faucet
customer_reviews.text: Love the faucet. It was easy to install and looks great. It hangs a little low but no lower than the over flow drain so thats not an issue for us. Works excellent! I would say it's a perfect fit for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jonancy

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my laundry room with an old farm house sink. I love it. it looks classy and feels nice and solid.
customer_reviews.author: jkal

customer_reviews.title: overpowering
customer_reviews.text: When mounted on the tub the spout seemed large & ugly. The faucet also mounted too low in the tub. It just overpowered the tub. Quality was good - just not my taste. We returned it and purchased the crook neck style. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Edward D. Crute

customer_reviews.title: Clawfoot tub faucet
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered early. It was exactly as advertised. I will definately buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Alfred

customer_reviews.title: An elephant in your bath tub!
customer_reviews.text: A quarter of your tub is taken up by the spout. When I contacted Kingston Brass they could have cared less. I asked if I could swap out the spout for a direct downward tub filler as there appears to be a way to detach. They told me no but if I wanted to I could contact their supplier ---in Taiwan. Thanks a lot! If it would not cost so much to install another I would throw the whole apparatus away and get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Pattiac

product_meta.title: Kingston Brass KS265C Clawfoot Tub Wall Mount Faucet, Polished Chrome,6-Inch Adjustable Center
product_meta.description:
Color:Polished ChromeFROM THE MANUFACTURER
Featuring with Unique Design Elements, Kingston Brass Faucets are in a Timeless Appeal as well as Reliable Performance for Today's Bathrooms. That Makes Showering a Pleasant and Enjoyable Experience for Users. Price offerings are available at a Very Competitive and Affordable Level that makes purchases irresistible. Different Designer Styles of Handles and Finishes are Available. Timeless Design offered you with a solution for both premiere home decor and legendary durability. All products come with a generous product warranty. Many Hardware Accessories are made to match faucets to complete your home into a designer estate.
feature_bullets: Max 2.0 GPM/7.6 LPM Flow Rate on Hand Shower at 80 PSI; Compliant with California Energy Commission Title 20
For Tub Mount Use; Mounting Hardware included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
